name: Sound Pack | Creatures Vol. 1
description:
The first AudioElk Creature sound library is here! Growls, roars, hisses, and more. This library includes:

- 72 high quality stereo WAV files featuring deep growls, hisses, roars, and more!

- Descriptive file names for easy search functionality!

- Royalty free for personal and non commercial use!

- 24 bit/48 kHz stereo WAV files!

View 'Demo' section for track lists, samples, and licensing agreement!
